explains: v. <正式>使陶醉，使入迷；对……施魔法

sentences.en: Can the wizard enchant Ford instead?
sentences.cn: 魔术师是否能施法于福特？

sentences.en: Enchant is capable of managing multiple different base spelling lists.
sentences.cn: Enchant能够管理多个不同的基础拼写列表。

sentences.en: If a woman wants to enchant a man, she is wise to play his pupil. Men fall for this.
sentences.cn: 若是一个女人意欲取悦一个男人，她最好跟他谈点儿年少梦想什么的，男人通常都吃这一套。
